username.tooltip: Set a username which you want to display public repositories for

enable-auto-refresh.description: Check this to enable automatic refreshing
enable-auto-refresh.tooltip: Checking this will mean the applet will update itself according to your refresh interval

enable-verbose-logging.description: Check this to enable lots of logging in Looking Glass
enable-verbose-logging.tooltip: Checking this will enable lots of logging

enable-github-change-notifications.description: Check this to enable notifications about changes to Watchers, Forks and Issues
enable-github-change-notifications.tooltip: Checking this will enable more notification messages

show-issues-icon-on-repo-name.description: Check this show the number of open issues next to the repository
show-issues-icon-on-repo-name.tooltip: Checking this show the number of issues next to each repository

refresh-interval.tooltip: Change the amount of time between checking GitHub for changes to your Repositories

open-github-homepage-button.tooltip: Open github.com - fork the code or add features
